# checkSpelling(_:)

**Instance Method**

This action method searches for a misspelled word in the receiver’s text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func checkSpelling(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Discussion

The search starts at the end of the selection and continues until it reaches a word suspected of being misspelled or the end of the text. If a word isn’t recognized by the spelling server, a [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSText/showGuessPanel(_:)] message then opens the Guess panel and allows the user to make a correction or add the word to the local dictionary.

## Checking spelling

- **showGuessPanel(_:)**: This action method opens the Spelling panel, allowing the user to make a correction during spell checking.
